mapper.insert: insert into honour(student, type, prize, time) values (#{honour.student}, #{honour.type}, #{honour.prize}, #{honour.time,jdbcType=DATE})
mapper.select: select count(*) from honour where type like "%" #{type} "%"
select count(*) from honour where prize like "%" #{prize} "%"
select count(*) from honour where date_format(time, '%Y-%m-%d') = date_format(#{time}, '%Y-%m-%d')
select count(*) from honour where date_format(time, '%Y-%m') = date_format(#{time}, '%Y-%m')
select count(*) from honour where date_format(time, '%Y') = date_format(#{time}, '%Y')
mapper.update: update honour set student = #{student}, `type` = #{type}, prize = #{prize}, date_format(time, '%Y-%m-%d') = date_format(#{time}, '%Y-%m-%d') where id = #{id};
